entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries at times heavy and a few local snow squalls beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and a few snow squalls ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
